meanings.definition: The act of specializing in a particular subject or field of study at a college or university.
meanings.sent1: Her majoring in biology shows her love for science.
meanings.sent2: I am majoring in psychology at the university.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel majoring in acorn gathering was the top student in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His majoring in music was like composing a symphony of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Majoring in history opened a door to the past that fascinated her.

meanings.definition: The main or most important subject or area of focus.
meanings.sent1: Mathematics was his majoring in high school.
meanings.sent2: The majoring of the discussion was on climate change.
meanings.sent3: The majoring of the party was the delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: Her majoring in leadership made her stand out in the team.
meanings.sent5: The majoring of his collection was rare coins from around the world.
